channel.title: Safe Zones = NE + SW or NW + SE? {REP}
channel.description: Are safe zones NE corner and SW corner or other way around? Rep ++ if you tell me and it works.

item.title: Safe Zones = NE + SW or NW + SE? {REP}
item.dc:creator: @_M_ose ~M°ose~
item.description:
@_M_ose wrote:

[quote=“I pwnd you all, post:2, topic:148061”]Draw a box and think about it
A-----B
| |
| |
C-----D

If absX >= D’s Xcoord && absX <= A’s Xcoord && absY >= C’s Ycoord && absY <= B’s Ycoord

Or something very similar. Think of a box, and the <='s and >='s, it’ll come to you.[/quote]Thank you, It worked ++

And monkey. I am allowed to say I can rep and there snothing you can do about it, You just cant ask for rep.

Read full topic
item.source: Safe Zones = NE + SW or NW + SE? {REP}

item.title: Safe Zones = NE + SW or NW + SE? {REP}
item.dc:creator: @I_pwnd_you_all I pwnd you all
item.description:
@I_pwnd_you_all wrote:

Draw a box and think about it
A-----B
| |
| |
C-----D

If absX >= D’s Xcoord && absX <= A’s Xcoord && absY >= C’s Ycoord && absY <= B’s Ycoord

Or something very similar. Think of a box, and the <='s and >='s, it’ll come to you.
